definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect

sentences.english: Global warming caused a dryer and warmer climate in the centeral part of Qinghai-Tibet plateau.
sentences.chinese: 受全球變暖影響，青藏高原氣候呈現出暖幹趨勢。

sentences.english: Permafrost problems are the core of the three principal technical difficulties in the Qinghai-Tibet railway construction.
sentences.chinese: 青藏鐵路建設三大技術難題的核心是凍土問題。

sentences.english: Feng Yongfeng reports from the village of Cuochi on the Qinghai-Tibet plateau.
sentences.chinese: 馮永鋒來自青藏高原措池村的報道。

sentences.english: Speaking of the roads to Tibet, the most frequently taken is still the Qinghai-Tibet route.
sentences.chinese: 說起進藏的路，走的最多的還是青藏線。

sentences.english: The plateau is the world's third largest store of ice.
sentences.chinese: 青藏高原是世界第三大的冰儲藏地。

sentences.english: Sichuan is bordered by the Tibetan Plateau in the west and by the Three Gorges and the Yangtze River in the east.
sentences.chinese: 四川西臨青藏高原而東接三峽和長江。

sentences.english: The muscid biogeography of Qinghai-Xizang Plateau is studied.
sentences.chinese: 對青藏高原蠅科昆蟲進行了生物地理學研究。

sentences.english: The result suggests that the Himalayas and the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau will not continue to move up indefinitely.
sentences.chinese: 測量結果表明，喜馬拉雅山和青藏高原不會無限升高。

sentences.english: Tibetan railway might be an engineering marvel but an economic disaster.
sentences.chinese: 青藏鐵路也許是工程奇蹟，不過是個經濟災難。

sentences.english: Kangding County is located in the transition area between the west hilly edge of Sichuan Basin and the Tibetan Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 康定縣地處四川盆地西緣山地及青藏高原過渡地帶。

sentences.english: Besides, this paper also analyses the effect of the Tibetan high on the Changjiang-Huaihe Valley storm rainfall.
sentences.chinese: 文中還分析了青藏高壓對江淮暴雨的作用。

sentences.english: A lot of observational data on the atmospheric boundary layer over the plateau were obtained.
sentences.chinese: 獲得了大量的關於青藏高原大氣邊界層的寶貴資料。

sentences.english: The crust and lithosphere of the Tibet is very thick, and the LVZ is not obvious.
sentences.chinese: 青藏高原地殼岩石圈巨厚，上地幔低速帶不明顯。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the sensitivity of Yersinia pestis along Qinghai-Tibet Railway.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲了解青藏鐵路沿線鼠疫菌對抗生素的敏感性。

sentences.english: By the 13th century, Islam spread as far as to Tibet.
sentences.chinese: 13世紀，伊斯蘭已推進到青藏高原的四緣。

sentences.english: The authority also forecast light to moderate snow or sleet in the eastern Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 有關部門預報青藏高原東部地區將有小到中雪或凍雨。

definition: Mêdog county, Tibetan: Me tog rdzong, in Nyingchi prefecture 林芝地區|林芝地区[Lin2 zhi1 di4 qu1], Tibet
Golmud or Ge'ermu city (Tibetan: na gor mo grong khyer) in Haixi Mongol and Tibetan autonomous prefecture 海西蒙古族藏族自治州[Hai3 xi1 Meng3 gu3 zu2 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai
Gannan county in Qiqihar 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
Shigatse or Xigaze, Tibetan: Gzhis ka rtse, city and prefecture in central Tibet
Qinghai province (Tsinghai) in west China, abbr. 青, capital Xining 西寧|西宁
Dangla or Tanggula mountain range on the Qinhai-Tibet plateau
Tibet/Xizang or Tibetan autonomous region 西藏自治區|西藏自治区
Lhasa, capital city of Tibet autonomous region 西藏自治區|西藏自治区
Dartsendo, Dardo or Kangding county (Tibetan: dar mdo rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
Daocheng county (Tibetan: 'dab pa rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
Markam county, Tibetan: Smar khams rdzong, in Chamdo prefecture 昌都地區|昌都地区[Chang1 du1 di4 qu1], Tibet
